price: Kandi icyo ari cyo cyose mutavuzeho rumwe, itegeko ryacyo riba riri kwa Allah (mu gitabo cye). Uwo ni Allah, Nyagasani wanjye, ni We niringiye kandi ni na We nicuzaho.
arabic: وَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ فَحُكۡمُهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُنِيبُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā ikh'talaftum fīhi min shayin faḥuk'muhu ilā al-lahi dhālikumu al-lahu rabbī ʿalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unību
